contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox UK Bus | name = VDL SB200 | image = Claribels YD02 RCX.jpg | imagesize = 250px | caption = Claribels YD02RCX, the first DAF SB200 in UK | manufacturer = [[VDL Bus Chassis|DAF Bus/VDL Bus]] | factory = | replaced = | capacity = | operator = [[Arriva]] and others | length = | width = | height = | floortype = Low-floor | doors = 1 or 2 door | weight = | chassis = | engine = Cummins B-series/ISBe | powerout = | transmission = | options = Various customer options }} The '''VDL SB200''' (previously known as the '''DAF SB200''') is a light-weight 12m citybus produced from 2001 by [[VDL Bus International]] (formerly DAF Bus International). It replaced the [[DAF SB220|SB220]], the longest of the DAF bus chassis in the [[United Kingdom|UK]] before the renaming of DAF Bus International. It is originally designed for use by [[Arriva]] (VDL dealer in the UK) in order to save fuel over heavy-weight citybuses which are designed for [[Continental Europe]] where buses carry large numbers of standing passengers, whereas in the UK they do not.{{Dubious|date=February 2011}} The SB200 sells very well in VDL's home market, the [[Netherlands]] mainly using [[VDL Berkhof]] type [[Berkhof Ambassador|Ambassador]] and Citea LLE bodywork. They are operated by all large transport companies in the Netherlands, [[Connexxion]] (including Hermes), [[Veolia Transport]] and Arriva. Arriva also uses SB200 with [[Wrightbus|Wright]] bodywork. In the UK sales have been slow, not helped by the increased success that [[Volvo Buses|Volvo]] and [[Scania AB|Scania]] are having with heavy-weight citybuses. Apart from Arriva other notable users include Claribels in [[Birmingham]] (which took the first bus) and [[Fishwick Buses|Fishwick]] of [[Leyland, Lancashire|Leyland]]. Initially the SB200 built for the UK was only available with [[Wright Commander]] bodywork, but from 2006, it has been available with [[Plaxton Centro]] (the first of these examples went to Fishwick) or [[Wright Pulsar]] (successor of the Wright Commander) bodywork. ==See also== {{Portal|Buses}} Competitors: * [[Alexander Dennis Enviro300]] * [[Mercedes-Benz Citaro]] * [[Scania L94|Scania L94UB]] * [[Scania OmniCity]] * [[Volvo B7L]] * [[Volvo B7RLE]] Other VDL Bus products: * [[VDL DB250|DB250]] * [[VDL SB120|SB120]] * [[VDL SB250|SB250]] * [[VDL SB4000|SB4000]] ==External links== * [http://www.vdlbus.nl/UK/products/p_product2.htm Product description in VDL Bus website] [[Category:Buses]] [[Category:VDL|SB200]]
